text: Somatidia terrestris is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Broun in 1880. It contains the varietas Somatidia terrestris var. fuscata.BioLib.cz - Somatidia terrestris. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1880
title: Somatidia terrestris
